channel.title: Gear Cluster on StevenTammen.com
channel.description: Recent content in Gear Cluster on StevenTammen.com

item.title: Rain Gear
item.description: Waterproofing Don't need it when it's not raining, extra unnecessary material Additionally, want to be able to take off wet layers after rain â‡’ they should be separate Additionally, having waterproof/windproof shell separate from thermal layer means that it is more versatile and can be used across a wider temperature range than a single thermal layer that is waterproof/windproof. Argument could be made that it's one more jacket to carry around for cold, wet situations, but what if it is cold and rainy in the morning and hot and rainy in the afternoon?

item.title: Every Day Carry
item.description: Distinction between Every Day Carry and Everyday Carry This page is discussing the former, which includes the latter Components Essentials Wallet Phone Keys Plain Edge Folder Multitool Flashlight Bandana Keychain Gorilla Tape Hardware Encrypted Flash Drive Yubikey Leatherman Squirt Keychain Light Bic Mini (and a waterproofing/tinder solution) Caffiene/L-Theanine Pills and emergency cash in a 2.6" Go Tube. (Wrap with glow-in-the-dark tape). Safety pins Cordage/Utility Materials Locking Carabiner 600lb Technora Cord 200lb Kevlar 3-Strand Cord Velcro Ties Zip ties Ranger bands Binder Clips Superglue Scotch tape Masking tape Sharpie Ziploc bags Writing Materials Dot-Pad Notebook Sticky Notes 6"

item.title: Clothing
item.description: Everyday Clothes Shirt Belt Underwear Pants Vibram's KSO Evo Vibram's Trek Ascent Insulated (when it's too cold for the KSO's) Dressy Clothes Button-Down Shirt Underwear (same as above) Suit Toe Socks Dress Shoes Work Clothes Same shirt, belt, underwear and pants as everyday clothes Toe Socks (same as above) Second Sock Layer (worn to minimize rubbing) Work Boots Exercise Clothes Short Sleeve Baselayer Underwear (same as above) Cheap Synthetic Shorts Vibram's KSO Evo (same as above) In Colder Weather, Add Short Sleeve Baselayer Long Sleeve Baselayer Compression Calf Sleeves TODO Other Section Ideas Reason for cobra rigger's belt vs.
